passive.name: The Maiden in the Painting
passive.description: Increases DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. If the current HP of the target enemy is below or equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>, increases DMG dealt by follow-up attacks by an extra <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color>.
